default.title: Sendtime
default.description: Make scheduling meetings and appointments a breeze with Sendtime - the easy and efficient tool that's perfect for you and your team. With its sleek and user-friendly interface, managing your schedule has never been easier. Try it now for free and see how Sendtime can elevate your scheduling experience

myCalendar.title: Sendtime | My Calendar
myCalendar.description: With My Calendar, you can easily view all your scheduled events and create a personalized booking page in just a few clicks.
